interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: 3.3 Inch Hair Clips for Women Girls Thick Hair, Super Strong Hold Double Claw Hair Clips for Thin Hair, Nonslip Hair Claw Clips French Plastic Hair Jaw Clips Octopus Clip for All Hair Types, 3 Packs Review Date: 2021/08/29 Store: Mevnccola Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mevnccola', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'All Ages', 'Material': 'Plastic, Metal', 'Unit Count': '3.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '3.4 x 1 x 2.1 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'UPC': '733557234610'} Review Text: I use these types of hair clips a lot and these are a good size - not too big and not too small, and will work for long and think hair.

They don’t have the best grip however which is always the litmus test for me. They have to stay and this is not the tightest hold and would not hold up to a workout.

They are also quite thin and brittle feeling! Don’t see them holding up for a long time. Would pay more for better quality Review Title: Not the best grip and feels a little thin and cheap Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Biutee Nail Mirror Powder4 Boxes 8 Colors 0.5g with 4 Brushes Nail Chameleon Powder Nail Glitter Nail Chrome Powder Manicure Unicorn Chrome Pigments Biutee {'Package Dimensions': '5.63 x 5.59 x 1.97 inches; 0.02 Ounces'} I had never tried decorative nail powder before ; in fact never even heard of this product so was curious to give it a go and so glad that I did!! Its super easy to use and creates some really cool effects with relative ease.

In a nutshell, you use it with gel nail colors: Apply your basecoat, color (this suggests plain black or white for the best effects) then top coat. Do not use rubbing alcohol at this point as you would typically do, but instead apply the powder, which is just like eyeshadow with an eyeshadow type applicator then seal with one last coat of gel top coat.

It has a chrome like effect and blends nicely , to create all kinds of effects. It is very easy to use, much easier than gel nail polish itself and can even hide imperfections! Love it !! Love this powder ! So easy to use and create unique fun effects Pursoma Beyond The Body After the Class Post Workout Soak, 9 oz Pursoma {'Brand': 'Pursoma', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Stress Relief,Anti-inflammatory,Pain Relief,Cleansing,Pore', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5 x 7.5 inches; 9.24 Ounces', 'UPC': '857525007096'} On the fence on this product for one reason: price!! Don't get me wrong - I love a good bath and maybe I am crazy but I will pay up to $20 to my favorite retailer for their beautiful CBD bath bombs (which yes, also includes a crystal) but as an avid bath salt user from basic to boutique; I cannot for the life of me understand what is in this product that justifies that price point. I compared to some of my premium brands too; just to see what this might have that they don't

After a long spin class followed by 30 minutes of strength workouts I was feeling the muscle burn so I added this to my bath and soaked for 20 minutes. The smell is not my favorite but it is one I am used to from some of the other brands I use and it is consistent with the natural ingredients. It is hard to define but I would say it has an almost clinical smell. It reminds me of a very clean hospital - not bad, just not my personal favorite scent. That said, they do use all natural ingredients so for that I am willing to pay more and I will say it was very relaxing, and helped with the muscle soreness.

You do also get a rather large crystal in the bag -I like crystals but here is a watch out just in case you are not bothered one way or another - the crystal weighed 1oz so you are getting 8oz salts which is enough for one bath with 1/9 of the bag weight being taken up by the crystal.

Now to be fair, the ingredient list does show all natural with no fillers that you might see in cheaper products such as coconut oil or unsourced scents and I really do feel crazy relaxed after this bath! Just wish it was maybe enough for 2/3 baths !! Very relaxing, all natural. Clinical but clean scent. Pricey for size! Atlas Semi Matte Texture Putty | Medium Shine | Medium Hold | Thickening | Texturizing | Defining | Styling and Grooming Product for Men and Women | For All Hair Types Atlas {'Hair Type': 'Coarse, Wavy, Curly', 'Scent': 'Masculine', 'Liquid Volume': '70 Milliliters', 'Item Form': 'Clay', 'Brand': 'Atlas', 'Product Dimensions': '2.95 x 2.95 x 1.18 inches; 2.57 Ounces', 'UPC': '854659007237'} Has a great scent so that’s the first thing I noticed. Smells masculine like a fresh cologne but certainly not overpowering . Scent mutes a little once applied so it still smells nice but won’t bother you either .

Has a nice amount of hold and it’s a good semi matte with just a hint of shine. It has a good amount of hold that is buildable with the right amount of product and it washes out easily with no residue.

Impressed and would buy again Great since and buildable hold ! Little Moon Essentials Floral Bath & Shower Sugar Exfoliant, Relax, 2 oz. Little Moon Essentials {'Brand': 'Little Moon Essentials', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Material Type Free': 'preservative free,paraben free', 'Package Dimensions': '2.2 x 2.2 x 1.3 inches; 2 Ounces', 'UPC': '673673882459'} I love this. It looks like something you might get from a Farmers market or local beauty boutique - it has a very handmade feel, in a good way!

Perfect size for travel which is important to me as I am on planes weekly; this is a great scrub that smells lovely. I got "relax" which has a calming lavender scent and it is natural and chemical free. Does a really great job of exfoliating without being too rough or too soft.

I will buy again as it smells great, is natural and a great size for travel with a nice, portable container I will buy again: Smells great, is natural and a great size for travel with a portable container MERISIHAIR Short Pink Bob Wig for Women,Pink Short Straight Wig ,Shoulder Length Bob Wigs for Women Colorful Fashion Bob Wigs MERISIHAIR {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'MERISIHAIR', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '10.24 x 6.93 x 2.91 inches; 10.55 Ounces', 'UPC': '780744482941'} Got this for a teen who was heading to a costume party as the wigs you get in costume stores tend to be more money for sognifolrss quality

It’s just what we wanted. Good quality - it’ fits well and the wig cap is comfortable. The hair has enough volume that it covers with no exposed wig base. And it can be worn right out the bag, no need for cutting or styling!

Price is great and the quality is there! Great wig Cute wig, good quality and fun look Gel Nail Polish Kit With U V LED Light Nail Kit With 150W Nail Lamp 10 Colors Soak Off Gel Polish Nail Art Salon & Starter Kit With Rhinestones Glitters Manicure Tool Kit JEWHITENY {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'JEWHITENY', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Product Dimensions': '9.69 x 6.46 x 8.54 inches; 2.64 Pounds'} I have tried many of these kits and though they are great when they come with everything you need to get your nails done; the quality can wildly vary.

This was not one of the better kits. The lamp took a whirl to dry and does not feel very sturdy. The same can be said of many of the tools or accessories that feel a bit chintzy and not that durable.

The colors were okay, many not ones I would pick out but the shimmers / glitters were pretty and they do apply well.

This kit is a lot cheaper than similar kits bjt ty do get what you pay for . Okay kit, not very durable and lamp not the best 3.3 Inch Hair Clips for Women Girls Thick Hair, Super Strong Hold Double Claw Hair Clips for Thin Hair, Nonslip Hair Claw Clips French Plastic Hair Jaw Clips Octopus Clip for All Hair Types, 3 Packs Mevnccola {'Brand': 'Mevnccola', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'All Ages', 'Material': 'Plastic, Metal', 'Unit Count': '3.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '3.4 x 1 x 2.1 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'UPC': '733557234610'} I use these types of hair clips a lot and these are a good size - not too big and not too small, and will work for long and think hair.

They don’t have the best grip however which is always the litmus test for me. They have to stay and this is not the tightest hold and would not hold up to a workout.

They are also quite thin and brittle feeling! Don’t see them holding up for a long time. Would pay more for better quality Not the best grip and feels a little thin and cheap
profile:
**User Summary:**

The user maintains a strong interest in nail care, focusing on creative decoration with versatile products that enhance manicure outcomes, particularly with gel formulations. Their recent purchase of a gel nail kit reflects their commitment to quality and practicality, though they prefer durable and reliable tools that deliver satisfying results. This aligns with their previous behaviors of prioritizing creativity alongside effectiveness in their beauty routines.

Expanding their focus to grooming and self-care, especially with hair accessories, the user demonstrates a holistic approach to personal aesthetics and well-being. Their inclination towards playful self-expression is evident in their interest in diverse hair accessories, such as claw clips, showcasing creativity in their everyday styling.

While the user appreciates travel-friendly, luxurious products featuring natural ingredients, they emphasize quality, often scrutinizing value against cost. Their review of recent hair clips indicates a critical perspective on product durability and performance, as they seek reliable items that enhance their grooming experience. Overall, the user balances practicality with a passion for beauty and self-care, continuously exploring ways to elevate their personal style and express their creativity, while exercising discernment in their purchases.
